name: Decoloration
description:
An action puzzle game where you play as a square that contains RGB values of color

Made for the Mini Jam 111: Colors²

Controls:

Arrow Keys or WASD - Move 

Left click - Release Color

Right click - Grab Color Back

Mouse Wheel or 1, 2, 3 - Change Color to Release

R - Restart 

Enter - Skip Level

Music - Kevin MacLeod - Beauty Flow
